Typealiases.html#/s:10UrbanPiper13APICom.name: APICompletion
Typealiases.html#/s:10UrbanPiper13APICom.abstract: Callback that is called when the api call succeeds with the relevant response object

Typealiases.html#/s:10UrbanPiper10APIFai.name: APIFailure
Typealiases.html#/s:10UrbanPiper10APIFai.abstract: Callback that is called when the api call fails with an error object

Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.name: sessionExpired
Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.abstract: Notification posted when the user’s session has expired

Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.name: userInfoChanged
Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.abstract: Notification posted when the user details are changed

Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.name: userBizInfoChanged
Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.abstract: Notification posted when the user biz details(i.e points, balance etc) are changed

Enums/SDKEvent.html.name: SDKEvent
Enums/SDKEvent.html.abstract: Events that should be handled by the SDK client, the event are passed to the client via the callback of the SDK initializer

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@M@UrbanPiper.name: sharedInstance()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@M@UrbanPiper.abstract: Returns the shared instance that was initialized

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: intialize(language:bizId:apiUsername:apiKey:callback:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Intializes the UrbanPiper, the initialized instance of the SDK is accessible via the static func sharedInstance()

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: change(language:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Change the Language of the data being returned from the server after the SDK has been initialized

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: currentLanguage()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: The Language value that is sent to the server as part of the api call header

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: getUser()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: Function returns the the saved User object for a logged in user and nil for a guest user

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: startRegistration()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Function returns a new instance of the helper class RegistrationBuilder that contains the api calls to perform a user registration

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: startSocialRegistration()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Function returns a new instance of the helper class SocialRegBuilder that contains the api calls to perform a social user registration

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: startPasswordReset()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Function returns a new instance of the helper class ResetPasswordBuilder that contains the api calls to perform a password reset

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: logout()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Function to logout the user and remove all the user related data from memory and persistant storage

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: login(phone:password:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: API call to Log-in a registered user

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: socialLogin(email:socialLoginProvider:accessToken:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: API call to login an social login user

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: refreshUserInfo(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: API call to retrieve the updated user info from the server, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: refreshUserBizInfo(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: API call to retrieve the user’s updated biz info (i.e. balance, points) from the server, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: updateUserInfo(name:email:gender:aniversary:birthday:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: API call to update the user info in the server, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: changePassword(phone:oldPassword:newPassword:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: API call to change the password of the user, the password cannot be changed for a social login user, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: getDeliverableAddresses(storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: Get the user’s saved deliverable address for the provided store id, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: addAddress(address:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: API call to add a new address to the user’s saved addresses, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: updateAddress(address:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: API call to update the user’s address, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: deleteAddress(addressId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: API call to delete the user’s address, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getWalletTransactions(offset:limit:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Get the user’s wallet transactions, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: getPastOrders(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: Get the user’s past orders, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: getPastOrderDetails(orderId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: Get the user’s past order details, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: redeemReward(rewardId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: API call to reedem the reward available from the getRewards(...) API call, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getNotifications(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Get the list of user’s notfications, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: submitFeedback(name:rating:orderId:choiceText:comments:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: Use this method to submit the feedback for an completed order, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getItemLikes(offset:limit:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Get the items that where liked by the user, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: likeItem(itemId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: API call to like an item, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: unlikeItem(itemId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: API call to unlike an item, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: initWalletReload(amount:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: API call to initate a wallet reload, user needs to be logged in to make this call

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: verifyWalletReload(paymentId:transactionId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: API call to verify the wallet reload completed using a payment gateway

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: registerFCMToken(token:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Register the fcm token in urbanpiper server to receive the push notifications

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: checkAppVersion(version:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: API call to perform an version check with the urbanpiper server to indi

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getNearestStore(lat:lng:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: API call used to get the nearest store to the provided lat lng

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: getAllStores(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: Get all the stores registered for the business

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getCategories(storeId:offset:limit:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Get the list of categories set up for the business

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getCategoryItems(categoryId:storeId:filterBy:sortBy:offset:limit:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Get the items for a given category

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: searchItems(query:storeId:offset:limit:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: API call to search items for a keyword

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getFilterAndSortOptions(categoryId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Get the filter and sort options for a category

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getItemDetails(itemId:storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Get the item details for a given item id

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getFeaturedItems(storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Get the list of featured items

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getAssociatedItems(itemId:storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Get the list of associated items for the provided item id

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: getRewards(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: Get the list of rewards from the server

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getOffers(offset:limit:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Get the list of offers from the server

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getBanners(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Get the list of banners from the server

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: startCheckout()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Function returns a new instance of the helper class CheckoutBuilder that contains the api calls to place an order

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getCartItems()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Returns a list of items added to the cart

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getCartCount()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Returns the total item quantity of the cart

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getItemCountFor(itemId:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Returns the item quantity added to the cart for a given item id

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: getCartValue()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: The total value of the cart factoring the item quantities and the options selected

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: addItemToCart(cartItem:quantity:notes:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: Function call to add an cart item to the cart with the quantity to be added and the notes for the item

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: removeItemFromCart(itemId:quantity:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: Fuction to reduce the item quantity by the passed in quantity from cart

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: clearCart()
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: API call to clear all the items in the cart

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.name: getRelatedItemsForCart(itemIds:storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/s:10UrbanPiperA.abstract: API call to retrieve the item related to the cart ids provided

Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.name: reorder(orderId:lat:lng:storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiper.html#/c:@CM@UrbanPipe.abstract: Perform a reorder of an past order

Classes/UPError.html#/s:10UrbanPiper7UPE.name: data
Classes/UPError.html#/s:10UrbanPiper7UPE.abstract: Optional. Returns the data object from the failed api call

Classes/UPError.html#/s:10UrbanPiper7UPE.name: response
Classes/UPError.html#/s:10UrbanPiper7UPE.abstract: Optional. Returns the response object from the failed api call

Classes/UPError.html#/s:10UrbanPiper7UPE.name: responseDictionary
Classes/UPError.html#/s:10UrbanPiper7UPE.abstract: Optional. Returns a dictionary instance de-serialized from the json data object of the failed api call

Classes/UPError.html#/s:10UrbanPiper7UPE.name: httpStatusCode
Classes/UPError.html#/s:10UrbanPiper7UPE.abstract: Optional. Returns The HTTP status code of the failed api call

Classes/UPError.html#/s:10UrbanPiper7UPE.name: errorMessage
Classes/UPError.html#/s:10UrbanPiper7UPE.abstract: Returns the error message from the server if server error message is non nil else return the localizedDescription from the error object of the failed api call

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.name: verifyPhone(name:phone:email:gender:provider:providerAccessToken:completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.abstract: API call to check if the passed in phone number is already present in the system

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.name: registerSocialUser(completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.abstract: Function to register a new social login user

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.name: verifyRegOTP(otp:completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.abstract: API call to verify the OTP sent to the user’s phone number during registration, this function should be called only when the callback response message from registration is User has successfully been registered.

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.name: resendRegOTP(completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.abstract: API call the resend the OTP to the phone number passed in the registerSocialUser api call

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.name: verifySocialOTP(otp:completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.abstract: API call to verify the OTP sent to the user’s phone number during `verifyPhone(…) api call, this function can be used for all the case where the message is other than new_registration_required

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.name: resendSocialOTP(completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:10Urban.abstract: API call to resend the OTP to the phone number passed in the verifyPhone(...), api call, this function can be used for all the case where the message is other than new_registration_required

Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html#/s:10U.name: forgotPassword(phone:completion:failure:)
Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html#/s:10U.abstract: API call sends an otp to the phone number passed in if the phone number is registered in the sytem, the phone number needs to contain the country code

Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html#/s:10U.name: resetPassword(otp:password:confirmPassword:completion:failure:)
Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html#/s:10U.abstract: API call to reset the password of the user

Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:10Ur.name: registerUser(phone:name:email:password:completion:failure:)
Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:10Ur.abstract: API call to register an user to your business

Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:10Ur.name: verifyRegOTP(phone:otp:completion:failure:)
Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:10Ur.abstract: API call to verify the otp sent to the user’s phone number

Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:10Ur.name: resendRegOTP(phone:completion:failure:)
Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:10Ur.abstract: Send a new otp to the passed in user’s phone number

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:10Urba.name: totalAmount
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:10Urba.abstract: the current total value of the item factoring the added options

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/c:@M@Urb.name: init(item:)
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/c:@M@Urb.abstract: The initializer takes the Item as a parameter

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:10Urba.name: selectedOptionsFor(groupId:)
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:10Urba.abstract: Function returns a list of ItemOption objects that where added for a given group id

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:10Urba.name: addOption(groupId:option:)
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:10Urba.abstract: Function to add an ItemOption to the ItemOptionBuilder

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:10Urba.name: build()
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:10Urba.abstract: Build function validates if the ItemOption‘s have been added according to the values specified by the ItemOptionGroup.minSelectable and ItemOptionGroup.maxSelectable variables in the ItemOptionGroup

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.name: getPaymentModes()
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.abstract: Returns a list of payment options supported by the business, the validateCart(...), API has to be called atleast once to return the payment options

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.name: validateCart(store:useWalletCredits:deliveryOption:cartItems:orderTotal:completion:failure:)
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.abstract: API call to validate the items in cart, get the supported payments options, get order details such as taxes, delivery charges, payment charges etc.

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.name: validateCoupon(code:completion:failure:)
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.abstract: Apply a coupon to the cart items using this function, the coupon code can either be a code from the UrbanPiper.getOffers(...), api call or a code entered by the user

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.name: clearCoupon()
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.abstract: call this function to clear the applied coupon

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.name: initPayment(paymentOption:completion:failure:)
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.abstract: API call to initialize a payment in the urbanpiper server before performing a payment for all the payment options except Cash On Delivery, for COD you can skip this function and call directly the placeOrder(...), API

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.name: placeOrder(address:deliveryDate:deliveryTime:timeSlot:paymentOption:instructions:phone:completion:failure:)
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:10UrbanP.abstract: API call to place the order in urbanpiper server

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/c:@M@Urban.name: verifyPayment(pid:completion:failure:)
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/c:@M@Urban.abstract: API call the verify the payment transaction with the UrbanPiper server for PaymentOption.paymentGateway

Classes/UserInfoResponse.html#/c:@M@Urba.abstract: Returns all the available property values in the form of [String:Any] object where the key is the approperiate json key and the value is the value of the corresponding property

Classes/ReorderResponse.html#/c:@M@Urban.abstract: Returns all the available property values in the form of [String:Any] object where the key is the approperiate json key and the value is the value of the corresponding property

Classes/PaymentInitResponse.html#/c:@M@U.abstract: Returns all the available property values in the form of [String:Any] object where the key is the approperiate json key and the value is the value of the corresponding property

Classes/PastOrdersResponse.html#/c:@M@Ur.abstract: Returns all the available property values in the form of [String:Any] object where the key is the approperiate json key and the value is the value of the corresponding property

Classes/LoginResponse.html#/s:10UrbanPip.name: toDictionary()
Classes/LoginResponse.html#/s:10UrbanPip.abstract: Returns all the available property values in the form of [String:Any] object where the key is the approperiate json key and the value is the value of the corresponding property

Classes/ItemsSearchResponse.html#/s:10Ur.abstract: Returns all the available property values in the form of [String:Any] object where the key is the approperiate json key and the value is the value of the corresponding property

Classes/ItemOptionGroup.html#/s:10UrbanP.abstract: Returns all the available property values in the form of [String:Any] object where the key is the approperiate json key and the value is the value of the corresponding property

Classes/Item.html#/s:10UrbanPiper4ItemC1.abstract: Returns all the available property values in the form of [String:Any] object where the key is the approperiate json key and the value is the value of the corresponding property

Classes/CategoryItemsResponse.html#/s:10.abstract: Returns all the available property values in the form of [String:Any] object where the key is the approperiate json key and the value is the value of the corresponding property

Classes/AddUpdateAddressResponse.html#/c.abstract: Returns all the available property values in the form of [String:Any] object where the key is the approperiate json key and the value is the value of the corresponding property

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html.name: CheckoutBuilder
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html.abstract: A helper class that contains the related api’s to place an order. The api’s have to be called in the following order.

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html.name: ItemOptionBuilder
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html.abstract: ItemOptionBuilder is a helper class to build a cartItem with item options.

Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html.name: RegistrationBuilder
Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html.abstract: A helper class that contains the related api’s to register an user. The api’s have to be called in the following order.

Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html.name: ResetPasswordBuilder
Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html.abstract: A helper class that contains the related api’s to reset the user’s password. The api’s have to be called in the following order.

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html.name: SocialRegBuilder
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html.abstract: A helper class that contains the related api’s to register a social login user. The api’s have to be called in the following order.

Classes/UPError.html.name: UPError
Classes/UPError.html.abstract: The error class that is returned in case of api call failure via the APIFailure callback

Classes/UrbanPiper.html.name: UrbanPiper
Classes/UrbanPiper.html.abstract: The primary class for integrating UrbanPiper in your app

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
